text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali! Vam zapreshchayetsya v pishchu mertvechina, i to, chto zakoloto bez upominaniya imeni Allakha, myaso udavlennoy skotiny ili pavshey ot udara, ili ubivsheysya ot padeniya s vysoty, ili zabodannoy rogami drugogo zhivotnogo, ili myaso skotiny, kotoruyu zayel khishchnyy zver'. No myaso toy razreshonnoy skotiny, kotoruyu vy yeshcho zastali v zhivykh, goditsya v pishchu, yesli vy zakololi zhivotnoye po shariatu. Vam zapreshchayetsya upotreblyat' v pishchu myaso zhivotnykh, prinosimykh v zhertvu idolam. Vam zapreshchayetsya takzhe stremit'sya uznat' neizvestnoye budushcheye po strelam, a takzhe delit' chto-libo mezhdu soboy brosaniyem strel. Upotreblyat' v pishchu to, chto vam zapreshcheno, bol'shoy grekh i otkloneniye ot zakonov Allakha. Teper' nevernyye poteryali nadezhdu pokonchit' s vashey religiyey. Ne boytes', chto oni oderzhat pobedu nad vami, strashites' lish' Menya i ne otklonyaytes' ot Moikh zakonov. Segodnya YA zavershil veroustav vash, proyaviv k vam spolna Moyu milost'. YA blagoizvolil postavit' vam veroustavom islam - vashu religiyu - i daroval vam dostoinstvo i stoykost'. Tot, kto ispytyvaya golod, vynuzhden budet yest' to, chto musul'manam zapreshcheno v pishchu, i yel tol'ko, chtoby otvratit' opasnost' gibeli, ne sklonyayas' k grekhu, togo Allakh prostit. Poistine, Allakh - Proshchayushchiy, Milostivyy
